head.html:
<style>
nav.navbar {
  z-index: 20;
  background-color: white;
}

section {
  padding-top: 1rem;
  padding-left: 3rem !important;
  padding-right: 3rem !important;
}

section:first-child {
  padding-top: 3rem;
}

section.article-list div.card {
  overflow: hidden;
}

section.article-list div.card:hover div.card-img-top {
  transform: scale(1.05);
  transition: all .7s ease-out;
}

section.article-list div.card-body {
  z-index: 10;
  background-color: white;
  border-top: 1px solid #e3e3e3;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.25rem;
}

section.article-list div.card-body h4.card-title {
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  margin-top: 0.25rem;
}

section.article-list div.card-body p.card-text {
  text-align: justify;
}

@media (max-width: 991px),
(max-height: 800px) {
  section {
    padding-left: 2rem !important;
    padding-right: 2rem !important;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1200px) {
  section {
    padding-left: 10rem !important;
    padding-right: 10rem !important;
  }
  nav.navbar {
    padding-left: 3rem;
    padding-right: 3rem;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1400px) {
  section {
    padding-left: 20rem !important;
    padding-right: 20rem !important;
  }
  nav.navbar {
    padding-left: 5rem;
    padding-right: 5rem;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1800px) {
  section.article-list,
  section.all-articles,
  section.page-content,
  section.comments,
  main.page-article section.path-links,
  main.page-article section.page-header {
    padding-left: 30rem !important;
    padding-right: 30rem !important;
  }
  nav.navbar {
    padding-left: 10rem;
    padding-right: 10rem;
  }
}

#searchForm>.input-group>input {
  border-top-left-radius: .5rem!important;
  border-bottom-left-radius: .5rem!important;
}

#searchForm>.input-group>.input-group-btn>button {
  border-top-right-radius: .5rem!important;
  border-bottom-right-radius: .5rem!important;
}

.ya-share2__title {
  display: none !important;
}

section.sibling-links {
  display: none;
}

section.page-header h1 {
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

section.page-content h3 {
  margin-top: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-weight: bold;
}

section.page-content p {
  text-align: justify;
}

section.page-content hr {
  margin-top: 2.25rem;
}

section.page-content table {
  width: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

section.page-content table tr:first-child {
  font-weight: bold;
}

section.page-content table td {
  min-width: 10rem;
  text-align: center;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

section.page-content img {
  box-shadow: 0 .125rem .25rem rgba(0,0,0,.075);
  border: 1px solid #e3e3e3;
}
</style>
